UP10TION

Introduction

No Soo Il, also known as Kuhn, is the co-leader, lead rapper, and vocalist of the boy group UP10TION under TOP MEDIA. Aside from Rapping, Kuhn also has a knack for beatboxing.

On February 1, 2024 Kuhn took to social media to announce he was discharged from military early due to a herniated disk in his back and has been receiving treatment.
